--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Beachcomber broke away from his cautious aproach, to a dead sprint
> towards the dammaged robot. "Whoooooaaa, this isnt good." he said, 
to
> calmly for the situation. He kneeled, and the held up Redhot's head.
> "Tell me, what's wrong? How can I help." He said frantically.

    ::Redhot::

    Redhot felt his head being lifted. The gesture was concidered
rude 
where he came from, but he didn't have the mind or concentration to 
object.
    Once again, he forced himself to speak. His words screached 
softly.
    " H..heal." he whispered. "En..Energy. End pain...in...head."


Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
